string-array.name: historyEasy
string-array.item: "The Romans are defeated by the Germans in the battle of Teutoburg"
"The Romans start the invasion of Great Britain"
"The fire of Rome starts the first mass persecution of the Christians"
"Pompei and Ercolano are destroyed by the volcano Vesuvio"
"The construction of the Colosseum is completed"
"End of the Roman Empire of the West"
"Charles the Great becomes emperor of the Holy Roman Empire"
"Pope Urban II starts the first crusade"
"The fall of Costantinople sets the end of the Byzantine Empire"
"Leonardo da Vinci starts painting the Mona Lisa"
"Magellan completes the circumnavigation of the Earth"
"Hernan Cortes start the spanish conquest of Mexico"
"Francisco Pizarro leads the spanish conquest of the Incan Empire"
"Mary Tudor becomes the first queen of England"
"The english armies conquer New Amsterdam and rename it New York"
"The United States Constitution is written in Philadelphia"
"Foundation of the first british colony in Australia, Sidney"
"George Washington is elected as the first president of the United States"
"The first Universal Exposition is held in London"
"The first section of the London Underground opens"
"The Berlin Conference regulates European colonization and trade in Africa"
"Introduction of the first ever universal suffrage in New Zealand"
"The first modern Olympics are held in Athens"
"The Wright brothers complete the first cotrolled flight"
"Albert Einstein formulates the theory of relativity"
"Ford Motors introduces the first assembly line"
"The murder of the Archduke Ferdinand of Austria sets off the first World War"
"The Treaty of London leads to Italy joining the War"
"First use of chemical weapons in the Battle of Neuve"
"The armistice of 11 November puts an end to the first World War"
"Poland, Ukraine and more nations declare independence from Russia"
"The Treaty of Versailles rewrites Europe's borders"
"Adolf Hitler becomes the leader of the National-Socialist Party"
"The March on Rome leads to Benito Mussolini gaining power over Italy"
"Howard Carter discoveres the Tomb of Tutankhamun"
"Stalin becomes the leader of the Sovietic Union"
"The Wall Street crysis start the Great Depression"
"Pope Pius XI signs the Latral Pacts with Mussolini"
"Construction of the Empire State Building starts"
"Adoption of the current flag of the United States"
"Mao Zedung starts the Chinese Soviet Republic"
"For the first time the german Nazi party wins the majority in parliament"
"Adolf Hitler declares himself führer of Germany"
"The Times Magazine elects Adolf Hitler Person of the Year"
"Superman first appears in a DC comic"
"The german invasion of Poland starts the second World War"
"Nazi Germany invades France, Norway, Denmark and the Netherlands"
"Winston Churchill becomes Prime Minister of the United Kingdom"
"The attack on Pearl Harbour leads to the United States joining the War"
"Hitler starts the invasion of the Sovietic Union"
"The Battle of Stalingrad ends with more than 2 million casualties"
"Atomic bombs are dropped on Hiroshima and Nagasaki"
"The United Nations establish the Independent State of Israel"
"Beginning of the apartheid in South Africa"
"Division between South Corea and North Corea"
"Division between East Germany and West Germany"
"The launch of the Sputnik 1 sets the start of the space age"
"First image of the dark side of the Moon"
"First human descent in the Mariana Trench"
"Martin Luther King Jr hold his famous speech 'I have a dream' "
"The Apollo 11 is the first manned mission to land on the Moon"
"ARPANET is created, the first version of the internet"
"The Fall of Saigon sets the end of the War in Vietnam"
"First travel in orbit of the Space Shuttle"
"End of the Arturo Pinochet dictatorship in Chile"
"Start of the construction of the Channel Tunnel"
"George W. Bush is elected President of the United States"
"The end of the Sovetic Union leads to the creation of 15 independent states"
"The Treaty of Maastricht creates the European Union"
"Bill Clinton is elected President of the United States"
"The election of Nelson Mandela set the end of apartheid in South Africa"
"The War of Kosovo ends the Yugoslav Wars"
"The 9/11 terrorist attack on the World Trade Center"
"Start of the War on Terrorism in Afghanistan"
"Angela Merel becomes the first female chancellor of Germany"
"Barack Obama is elected president of the United States"
"Inauguration of the Burj Khalifa, the tallest building in the World"
"Start of the Arab Spring, with revolutions in Egypt, Libya and Tunisia"
"An earthquake in Japan causes the nuclear disaster of Fukushima"
"Death of Osama Bin Laden and Muammar Gaddafi"
"Felix Baumgartner is the first human to jump with a parachute from the Stratosphere"

string-array.name: historyHard
string-array.item: "The Roman Empire reaches is maximum territorial extent under Trajan"
"Costantinople becomes the capitol city of the Roman Empire"
"The sack of Rome by the Visigoths"
"First sack of english villages by the Vikings"
"The Great Schism between the Catholic Church and the Ortodox Church"
"Siege of Jerusalem during the first crusade"
"Murder of Thomas Becket in the Cathedral of Canterbury"
"In the Battle of Jaffa, King Richard I defeats the Sultan Saladin"
"Gengis Kahn becomes Great Kahn of the Mongol Empire"
"Marco Polo starts his first journey to Asia"
"The Black Plague starts spreading in Europe"
"Construction of the Forbidden City in Beijing is completed"
"Joan of Arc is burned at the stake"
"The battle of Castillon is the last fight of the Hundred Years War"
"Start of the War of the Roses"
"The marriage between Ferdinand of Aragon marries Isabella of Castile unifies Spain"
"The spanish Reconquista ends with the surrender of Granada"
"Leonardo da Vinci starts painting the Mona Lisa"
"Copernicus declares that the Sun is at the center of the solar system"
"Martin Luther writes the 95 theses starting the Protestant Reformation"
"The sack of Rome by Charles V ends the Italian Reneissance"
"The Church of England separetes itself from the Roman Catholic Church"
"Mary Tudor becomes the first Queen of England"
"Michelangelo Buonarroti becomes the main architect of the St. Peter's Basilica"
"Start of the Eighty Years War between Spain and the Netherland"
"The Spanish Conquistadores capture and kill the last king of the Incan Empire"
"Pope Gregory XIII introduces the Gregorian Calender"
"The Edict of Nantes end the French Wars of Religion"
"Giordano Bruno is burned at the stake"
"Louis XIV is elected king of France"
"The Dutch East India Company founds Cape Town"
"The first shipment of coffee arrives in Amsterdam"
"James Cook explores and maps Australia and New Zealand"
"Great Britain and the Kingdom of Ireland unite to form the United Kingdom"
"The United Kingdom abolishes the slave trade"
"The eruption of Mount Tambora is the strongest ever to be recorded"
"Foundation of Liberia, a state for the freed american slaves"
"The Battle of Alamo ends with the defeat of the Texians"
"Construction of the Big Ben is completed"
"Giuseppe Garibaldi leads the Expedition of the Thousand"
"The United States of America acquire Alaska from Russia"
"Abolition of the order of the samurai in Japan"
"The British East India Company is dismantled"
"Invasion and occupation of Egypt by the United Kingdom"
"Hawaii officially becomes part of the United States of America"
"The first Tour the France is held"
"Roald Amundsen is the first man to reach the South Pole"
"The Armenian Genocide perpetuated by the Ottoman Empire"
"Ankara replaces Istanbul as the capital of Turkey"
"Vatican City is acknowledged as an independent state"

string-array.item: "The first machine to artificially produce ice"
"The first wind turbine used to generate electricity"
"The V-2, the first long range controllable missile"
"First use of atomic energy to produce electricity"
"Solar energy is first stored in a battery"
"Launch of the first artificial satellite, the Sputnik 1"
"Creation of the first integrated circuit, also known as chip"
"The first graphic interface for a computer"
"Proof of the existence of the Higgs Boson"
"Confirmation of the existence of gravitational waves"

resources.string: %1$s is having trouble with Google Play services. Please try again.
You start every game with a set number of points depending on the category, you find them at the top of the screen
Guess the year in which a historic event happened, something was invented, a movie, videogame or book was released
"Allow Ad to store image in Picture gallery?"
Allow Ad to create a calendar event?
Answer as many questions as you can, the game ends if you run out of points
For every correct answer you will gain points, but if you are wrong you will lose the difference between the correct answer and yours
